ComicInfo.Title: Trial by fire!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-11 15:18:23. [CVDB93883] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 20:08:56. [Issue ID 208726]
ComicInfo.Writer: Joseph Zyskowski,Joseph A. Zyskowski,Joseph A. Zyskowski
ComicInfo.Penciller: Eric Pence,John Watkins-Chow,Julius Jackson,Terral Lawrence,Terral Lawrence
ComicInfo.Inker: Frank Parr,Mark Lasota,Patricia Laskowski,Frank Parr,Patricia Laskowski

ComicInfo.Characters: Safeguard],Princess,Mittimus (death),Gridlock,Perdura,Captain Roger Sullivan [War Party],Judgment Day [Scattergun,Salubrio,Level Lord,Hatchet,Giser
ComicInfo.Summary: Trial by fire!: Judgment Day is stranded in Hell by Rift. Salubrio is made a princess of Hell. Sullivan fights off Mr Yoshido's ninjas. Giser kills Mittimus to 'free' Mortar.
